path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/AsphaltNFT Smart Contract Final Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Unindexed event parameters
findings.description: Events do not have any indexed parameters. Unindexed parameters make it difficult to track

findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: The mintFor() function takes a quantity parameter which is checked on L59 to expect it to be 1, but this quantity parameter is not used in the function making it redundant.

findings.title: Malicious Owner Can Mint NFTs or Change Base URI
findings.description: The malicious owner can mint NFTs to any addresses using mintFor() or change the base URI.

findings.title: General recommendation
findings.description: Some suggestions and best practices are also provided in order to improve the code quality and security posture.
